mapper.sql: id, project_id, task_id, uuid, sender_id, plan_end_on, end_on, area_id, area_path_and_id, category_cls, category_key, category_path_and_key, check_item_key, check_item_path_and_key, drawing_m_d5, pos_x, pos_y, title, typ, content, `condition`, status, repairer_id, repairer_follower_ids, client_create_at, last_assigner, last_assign_at, last_repairer, last_repairer_at, destroy_user, destroy_at, delete_user, delete_time, create_at, update_at, delete_at
mapper.select:
select uuid,title,pos_x,pos_y,typ,area_id from house_qm_check_task_issue where uuid in
#{issueUuid}
and client_create_at < from_unixtime(#{timestamp},'%y-%m-%d')
and delete_at is null

SELECT area_id,typ,sender_id AS user_id,area_path_and_id,COUNT(*) AS count from house_qm_check_task_issue WHERE project_id=#{projectId} AND task_id IN
#{taskId}
and delete_at is NULL
GROUP BY area_id,sender_id,typ

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date from house_qm_check_task_issue WHERE project_id=#{projectId} AND task_id IN
#{taskId}
AND delete_at IS NULL
GROUP BY date

SELECT area_id,typ,sender_id as user_id,area_path_and_id,COUNT(*) AS count from house_qm_check_task_issue WHERE project_id=#{projectId} AND task_id IN
#{taskId}
AND client_create_at >= #{date} AND client_create_at <= DATE_ADD(#{date},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND delete_at IS NULL
GROUP BY area_id,typ

SELECT area_id,typ,sender_id,area_path_and_id,COUNT(*) AS count from house_qm_check_task_issue WHERE project_id=#{projectId} AND task_id IN
#{taskId}
AND client_create_at <= (DATE_ADD(#{date},INTERVAL 1 DAY))
AND delete_at IS NULL
GROUP BY area_path_and_id

SELECT LEFT(area_path_and_id,LENGTH(area_path_and_id)-LENGTH(area_id)-1) AS area_path, area_id,MIN(status) AS status,COUNT(*) AS extend_col FROM house_qm_check_task_issue WHERE task_id=#{taskId} AND typ IN
#{type}
AND delete_at IS NULL
GROUP BY area_path

select.select:
SELECT check_item_key,check_item_path_and_key,category_key,category_path_and_key,count(*)as count from house_qm_check_task_issue WHERE project_id=#{projectId} AND area_path_and_id LIKE concat('%', #{areaId},'%') AND task_id=#{taskId} AND typ IN
#{type}
AND client_create_at >= #{begin} AND client_create_at <= DATE_ADD(#{endOns},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
and delete_at is NULL
GROUP BY category_path_and_key,check_item_key
